name: O (Karmelyth)
description:
Avoid bullets and kill enemies under the time limit in an increasingly smaller arena. Red enemies fire bullets, orange enemies will try to touch you. Fire your white disc at enemies to slowly kill them. Kill enemies and stay close to bullets and orange enemies to gain points.

Made for a private game jam in 8 hours.

High quality sprites will come eventually!

Controls:

   WASD: Move

   Left mouse button: Fire

Credits:

   Sprites by HIS @TinyBox11

   Code by Karmelyth @karmelyth (Karmelyth#7168)
